00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_LINE_EDIT_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_LINE_EDIT_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include "mimas/constants.h"
00034 
00035 using namespace lubyk;
00036 
00037 #include <QtGui/QWidget>
00038 #include <QtGui/QLineEdit>
00039 #include <QtGui/QMouseEvent>
00040 
00041 namespace mimas {
00042 
00047 class LineEdit : public QLineEdit, public ThreadedLuaObject
00048 {
00049   Q_OBJECT
00050   Q_PROPERTY(QString class READ cssClass)
00051 
00052   
00054   float hue_;
00055 public:
00056   LineEdit(const char *content = NULL, QWidget *parent = NULL)
00057      : QLineEdit(content, parent), hue_(-1) {
00058     QObject::connect(this, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00059                      this, SLOT(editingFinishedSlot()));
00060 
00061     QObject::connect(this, SIGNAL(textEdited(QString)),
00062                      this, SLOT(textEditedSlot(QString)));
00063     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00064   }
00065 
00066   ~LineEdit() {
00067     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00068   }
00069 
00070   // ============================ common code to all mimas Widgets
00071 
00072   QString cssClass() const {
00073     return QString("line_edit");
00074   }
00075 
00076   QWidget *widget() {
00077     return this;
00078   }
00079 
00080   void setParent(QWidget *parent) {
00081     QWidget::setParent(parent);
00082   }
00083 
00084   QObject *object() {
00085     return this;
00086   }
00087 
00091   LuaStackSize globalPosition(lua_State *L) {
00092     QPoint pt = mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0));
00093     lua_pushnumber(L, pt.x());
00094     lua_pushnumber(L, pt.y());
00095     return 2;
00096   }
00097 
00100   void globalMove(float x, float y) {
00101     QWidget::move(mapToParent(mapFromGlobal(QPoint(x, y))));
00102   }
00103 
00106   LuaStackSize name(lua_State *L) {
00107     lua_pushstring(L, QObject::objectName().toUtf8().data());
00108     return 1;
00109   }
00110 
00113   void setName(const char *name) {
00114     QObject::setObjectName(QString(name));
00115   }
00116 
00117   void move(int x, int y) {
00118     QWidget::move(x, y);
00119   }
00120 
00121   void resize(int w, int h) {
00122     QWidget::resize(w, h);
00123   }
00124 
00125   int x() {
00126     return QWidget::x();
00127   }
00128 
00129   int y() {
00130     return QWidget::y();
00131   }
00132 
00133   int width() {
00134     return QWidget::width();
00135   }
00136 
00137   int height() {
00138     return QWidget::height();
00139   }
00140 
00141   void setStyle(const char *text) {
00142     setStyleSheet(QString(".%1 { %2 }").arg(cssClass()).arg(text));
00143   }
00144 
00145   void setHue(float hue) {
00146     hue_ = hue;
00147     QWidget::update();
00148   }
00149 
00150   float hue() {
00151     return hue_;
00152   }
00153 
00154   void hide() {
00155     QWidget::hide();
00156   }
00157 
00158   // =============================================================
00159 
00160   void setText(const char *text) {
00161     QLineEdit::setText(QString(text));
00162     QWidget::update();
00163   }
00164 
00165   const char *text() const {
00166     return QLineEdit::text().toUtf8().data();
00167   }
00168 
00169   void setSelection(int start, int length) {
00170     QLineEdit::setSelection(start, length);
00171   }
00172 
00173   void selectAll() {
00174     QLineEdit::selectAll();
00175   }
00176 
00177   void setFocus() { // Qt::FocusReason reason
00178     QWidget::setFocus(Qt::OtherFocusReason);
00179   }
00180 
00181 protected:
00182 
00183   virtual void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00184     if (!keyboard(event, true)) {
00185       QLineEdit::keyPressEvent(event);
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   virtual void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00190     if (!keyboard(event, false)) {
00191       QLineEdit::keyReleaseEvent(event);
00192     }
00193   }
00194 
00195   virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00196     if (!click(event, MousePress)) {
00197       QLineEdit::mousePressEvent(event);
00198     }
00199   }
00200 
00201   virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00202     if (!click(event, DoubleClick)) {
00203       QLineEdit::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00204     }
00205   }
00206 
00207   virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00208     if (!click(event, MouseRelease)) {
00209       QLineEdit::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00210     }
00211   }
00212 
00213   virtual void moveEvent(QMoveEvent * event);
00214   virtual void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event);
00215 
00216 private:
00217   virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event);
00218   bool keyboard(QKeyEvent *event, bool isPressed);
00219   bool click(QMouseEvent *event, int type);
00220 
00221 private slots:
00222 
00223   // set function to call on text change
00224   // textChanged(const QString & text)
00225 
00226   // connected to the editingFinished signal
00227         void editingFinishedSlot();
00228 
00229   // connected to the textEdited signal
00230         void textEditedSlot(const QString &text);
00231 };
